column3: JPja
column4: USen

column3: 勇者様って？
column4: Legendary hero?

column3: 伝説の剣って？
column4: Legendary sword?

column3: さようなら
column4: Bye.

column3: わたしが勇者です
column4: I am he.

column3: 人違いです…
column4: Uh... What?

column3: 勇者です…
column4: Yes, I am the hero.

column3: さようなら
column4: Bye.

column3: 待って！
column4: Wait!

column3:
旅の途中で
伝説の剣を持つという勇者様に出会ったら…
わたしは ここで待ってる って伝えてね
column4:
If you happen to meet the hero who
wields the legendary sword during your
travels...
Tell him I'm waiting for him here.

column3: やっと来たのね…
column4: You're finally here...

column3:
この樹の下で勇者様に会えるってウワサ
本当だったんだわ！
column4:
So it was true! I met the hero of Hyrule
under this sacred tree!

column3: 早く わたしの勇者様を見つけて来てね
column4:
Please search for the hero of Hyrule!
Tell him I'm waiting for him!

column3:
うそっ…！

その剣が何よりの証拠…
あなたが わたしの勇者様なんでしょ！
column4:
Don't try to hide it!


That sword there is proof enough...
You are the hero I've been waiting for!

column3:
やっぱり あなたなのね！

その剣が何よりの証拠…
会えて うれしいわ！
column4:
I knew it was you!


That sword leaves no room for doubt.
I'm so happy to finally meet you!

column3:
あら？
わたしの勇者様には会えたかしら？
column4: So did you meet the hero of Hyrule?

column3:
うそっ…！

あなた… だったのね！

その剣が何よりの証拠…
会えて うれしいわ！
column4:
WHAT?!


So...it WAS you!


That sword is proof enough...
I'M SO HAPPY RIGHT NOW!

column3:
これ… わたしの気持ちです
受け取ってください！
column4:
This...is a little something I've been
saving for you. Please take it!

column3:
何か わたしの気持ちの品を あげたいけど…
さすがは勇者様 ポーチがいっぱいなのね！
また空きができたら会いに来てね
わたし待ってるから！
column4:
I want to give you something, but your
pouch is totally full...as I would expect of
a hero!
Please come see me again once you have
a little room in there. I'll be waiting!

column3:
あー すっきりしたー！

何か…会えたら会えたで
どうでもよくなってきたわね…
よく見たら全然タイプじゃないし…
column4:
Oh, man. It feels SO good to check that
off the bucket list!

But...now that I've met you, some of the
excitement's gone. I mean, you're not
even my type...

column3:
ごめんなさい！

じゃ そういうことでー！
column4:
Sorry, buddy.


Well, toodle-oo!

column3:
勇者様は お忙しいのでしょう？

こんなところで油を売ってないで
世界を お救いくださいませ
column4:
You must be really busy, you know,
saving the world and all.

So instead of spending your time
chatting with random strangers, maybe
think about doing your job, yeah?

column3: うふふ…
column4: Heh hah hoh...

column3: いやーん
column4: Aaah!

column3:
うそっ…！

…って言われてみれば剣も持ってないし
みすぼらしい男ね…
column4:
So...uh...you're not the hero of Hyrule?
I was so sure...

...But now you mention it, you're way too
scrawny to be a hero. You don't even
have a sword!

column3:
やっぱり あなたなのね！

…って よく見たら剣を持ってないじゃない！

勇者様は伝説の剣を持ってるって話知ってる？
あなた偽物ね
column4:
I knew it! At long last I—


Wait a minute! You don't even have a
sword. You can't be the hero of legend!

Nice try, buddy. The hero of Hyrule
always carries the legendary sword with
him. Plus he's way tougher looking...

column3:
うそっ…！

…って言われてみれば

勇者様は伝説の剣を持ってるって聞いてたし…
やっぱり人違いね
column4:
So, uh, you're not the hero of legend?
I was so sure...

...But now that you mention it, you're
way too scrawny to be the hero. And you
don't have the legendary sword.

column3:
やっぱり あなたなのね！

…って騙されないわよ！

勇者様は伝説の剣を持ってるって話知ってる？
あなた持ってないじゃない！
column4:
I knew it! At long last I—


...Wait a minute!
You can't fool me!

Everyone knows the hero of Hyrule
wields the legendary sword!
You don't have it!

column3: ここじゃ雨にぬれちゃうわ…
column4: Eek! Rain!

column3:
あら？
わたしの勇者様には会えたかしら？
column4:
Oh, did you meet the hero of Hyrule that
wielded the legendary sword?

column3: うふふ…
column4: Hee hee...

column3:
このハイラルに厄災が降りかかった時に
世界を救ってくれるヒーローよ
その背には伝説の剣が携えられていて
そりゃもう かっこいいに決まってるわ
column4:
Oh, come on...
You know—the hero who saves Hyrule
whenever the Calamity takes hold?
He carries the legendary sword on his
back like it's no big thing.
How cool is that?

column3:
どこかの森に眠っていて
勇者様にしか引き抜けないそうよ
あー
早く会いたいなぁ…
column4:
The stories say that the sword sleeps
somewhere in the forest...waiting for the
hero to awaken it.
Oh, I wish I could meet him...
